TextBody:
Hi Faruk,



Please use the link below to schedule "Netwrix Support Ticket #00439761". Clicking the link will launch a scheduling page that displays attendees and available meeting times. Please select a time, add any additional information, click "Schedule Meeting", and you will receive a confirmation email.

We look forward to speaking with you soon!


 


Thanks!
Marian Ilies

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com
Subject: Schedule Meeting for "Netwrix Support Ticket #00439761"

TextBody:
Hello Faruk,

Due to the tight schedule that we have for tomorrow, we have arranged a remote session for Wednesday, March 26th at 11 AM Turkey time.
 
Click the link below to join the conference at the specified date and time:
https://netwrix.zoom.us/j/86109689784?pwd=OBsIEQ1nlJsRQfyHRFrSeHWwcqtjvR.1
Dial-in Info
+1 346 248 7799 
Additional numbers may be available upon entering the conference.  Additional Numbers

Meeting Number
86109689784

Password
424093
 
As during the remote we will need access to SSH, we would like to ask you to have prepared prior to our session, a snapshot of your Endpoint Protector appliance from the virtualization environment (VMWare, HyperV, AWS,Azure, GoogleCloud).
This would represent a double safety measure and also a quick way we can revert to the initial settings in the case where any modifications inadvertently affect the server or environment.
 
Without having a  snapshot prepared and confirmed in written, we will not proceed further with troubleshooting the backend.
 
Also, for better control during the remote session, we will please ask you to have the following apps installed:
 
-Putty
-Zoom

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com

Subject: Disk Expansion (A-Plas Genel Otomotiv)    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NGFyo:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NGFyo:ref

Hello Marian,

Thanks for your response. The date works for us. The customer has Putty and Zoom installed. They will also take a snapshot of the server before the session.

Best Regards.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #439761 - Disk Expansion (A-Plas Genel Otomotiv)

TextBody:
Hello Faruk,

Thank you for allowing us to assist you today.

To recap what we did in today's remote session:

We increased the size of the partition and also the allocated CPU.

If you have further issues/concerns, do not hesitate to contact us.

Have a great day!

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
